body:
Once enabled, returning to your saved form will require you to enter a unique passcode. This passcode is generated once you have accessed your email and will be sent via text message to your phone number.

You can also set this up at a later date.

items.label: Yes, I want to set-up Two-Step Authentication now

components.legend: Do you want to set-up Two-Step Authentication?
components.name: two_factor_authentication

heading: Stronger security for your GOV.UK form
lede: We strongly recommend you set-up Two-Step Authentication to add an extra layer of security to your form.
